author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Ong Jane Rebecca v Lim Lie Hoa and Others (No 5)
counsel: Andre Arul (Arul Chew and Partners) for plaintiff; Khoo Boo Jin and Daniel Tan (Wee Swee Teow and Co) for first defendant; Arul Chandran and Ooi Oon Tat (C Arul and Partners) for second defendant; Vinodh S Coomaraswamy and Chua Sui Tong (Shook Lin and Bok) for third and fourth defendants
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Appeals/Appeal from inquiry into value of estate that was subject of action in High Court/Whether findings as to value of estate and second defendant's share therein were correct/Whether findings as to amount of money previously paid to second defendant were correct
